column5: With this great weather forcast for the weekend,a full moon rising due for Monday, i am planning on heading out on the water this weekend for Small mouth.I've caught a few nice ones this summer on single spinners and worms, but not this weekend. I Picked up some BooYah weedless bucktail jigs, and i am going to tip them with some tubes that Brian(Misfish) sent me this summer.Black/blue, Chartreuse/black, Brown/gold bucktails, with watermelon/pink tubes. I found a few spots where the current flows over skinny water, into a deep V chanel with a rocky bottom on one side, and a gradual muddy slope on the other.Last weekend, i could see them on sonar, but couldnt tease them into biting.Hopefully wit this nice weather, i will get into them.  I'll let you know how it works out.  Paul
WHAT    .. a full moon rise and you're going for Smallies?? That's just food for what you should be chasin...  ..just sayin !
Paul   tsk tsk tsk    White Spinnerbait for smallies   You know that Good luck out there mon ami
Never know  I planted the seed in Roys mind, to go out with me one day this weekend.Just waiting for him to confirm.I'd love to show him how to catch a Musky What d'ya think Wayne?
Might tag on a white pork rind, just to give it a profile.
Well Paul... I'd be out there pullin one of these, or similar, but that's just me !
Nice  I may wait till christmas.I'm the boss, so i can give myself a 500 buck, tax free bonus.That should get me a Calcutta TE 400
Jesus... That's a lot if $$$$ siting there...
I'm going to be fishing Lac St-Louis on Sunday , will use nothing other than a WHITE  SPINNERBAIT all day long.
Full moon on Monday? sounds like my best bet for an aurora if ever there was one.. Wish my cuz would make time to go..

No way !!!! You will be literally 15  miles from me!!! 1 set of locks to the east is my fishing ground. http://maps.google.ca/maps?hl=en&q=laprairie+basin+south+shore+st+catherine&gs_upl=858l4446l1l7285l12l12l0l0l0l0l218l1890l0.11.1l12l0&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.,cf.osb&biw=1067&bih=443&wrapid=tlif131803988683210&um=1&ie=UTF-8&ei=cbGPTu7HOoTY0QGj1tBX&sa=X&oi=mode_link&ct=mode&cd=3&ved=0CCAQ_AUoAg
Good luck Paul. Wayne I thought you got rid of them things   Hope everyone gets out and has a blast this weekend  Oh yeah I must re check my calendar as my full moon is on Tuesday
Another bait of choice for smallies.... BIG'O    They can't resist them and 7" Gulp worms, cherry seed, wackie style    Again bonne chance mon ami
Ripping spinnerbaits and topwater for smallies tomorrow!  The bite should be on with this warm weather!
Atta boy Paul, I see you've been paying attention in class
Nice Wayne ... and remind me why you ARE'NT out there pullin on of those this wekend ???? Its Fantabulous !!! (Just sayin)
